resources.string: Are you sure you want to exit the game?

TRIPLE A COMBO

Babilonia, Alejandro B.
Cadeliña, Allyza Ruth P.
Lagniton, Angeline M.

Background: 
PUP Lagoon – Raja D.

Background Music:

Sound Effects:

1.) Choose the level of difficulty to start the game.
2.) Every level of difficulty has different length of time given to finish combining all the cards and also has different number of cards.
3.) During the game, choose one card to start and second card to match.
		3.1) If matched, you get +2 points and you need to answer a quiz.
				3.1.1) If the answer is correct, you get +1 point.
				3.1.2) If the answer is wrong, you get -1 point and the cards you matched will reshuffle.
		3.2) If you match the wrong cards, try again.
4) If the timer hits 0, game over. If all cards are matched, you win.
